items.sentence: I didn't like the shirt that Tom gave me for my birthday, so I gave it to John.
Instead of just the two of us, let's invite the whole class to do that with us.
Tom could've paid for Mary's ticket if he'd known she didn't have enough money.
She tried to get a tent at the shop, but she could not find the one she wanted.
Tom shaved his head to show support for Mary, who's going through chemotherapy.
Tom said that he didn't believe Mary really planned on going bowling with John.
The bicycle is the most elegant and efficient means of transport ever invented.
Don't pay attention to what everyone else says. What matters is what you think.
Tom tried to tickle Mary, but found out she was much less ticklish than he was.
Keep an eye on Tom. Heaven knows what he's capable of, left to his own devices.
